name: The Dark and Flat - Feedly
description: Give the Dark and Flat material design to Feedly
additional_info: For best look, choose feedly theme with dark background (like Asbestos or Black Cats) For more Dark and Flat styles click here Update 11/04/2018 - Small fix to change layout menu and styling for upgrade page Update 14/12/2017 - Added support to index page Update 17/11/2017 - Moved sidebar scrollbar to to left Update 25/09/2017 - Changed color to organize button in "more options" Update 14/09/2017 - Slight change to all caught up page Update 03/09/2017 - Readded "add to board" icon to articles and #hashtag chips Update 01/09/2017 - Support for article view Update 05/08/2017 - Fix the updated sources organizer Update 30/07/2017 - Change colors for some icons, add border to secondary (gray) buttons Update 27/07/2017 - Fix some colors Update 08/07/2017 - Remove icons for boards and team share, fix icons colors in title only and magazine views, change colors for buttons in preferences menu Update 14/06/2017 - FIxed header color Update 22/04/2017 - Fix colors in organize feeds Update 18/04/2017 - Articles you had read now will be grayed out, Add support for boards Update 16/03/2017 - Changes to title-only view mode Update 05/03/2017 - Fix color for some texts Update 28/02/2017 - Changed the colors of the icons inside the "add content" popup Update 27/02/2017 - REWRITTEN FROM SCRATCH! (Removed tons of old unneeded stuff) Update 01/12/2016 - Fixed preferences page Update 18/11/2016 - Made a quick fix for the recent site changes Update 13/08/2016 - Upgrade page fixed in addition to some small changes Update 07/07/2016 - 'Discover and follow' button in Sidebar added Update 01/07/2016 - Fix some colors Update 25/06/2016 - Remove orange from upgrade button Update 19/12/2015 - Darken some popups colors Update 27/11/2015 - Fix colors in some places Update 22/11/2015 - Mark on sidebar which feed you're on

discussions.name: Please consider the following additions to the style:
Consider adding to remove scrollbar in the feedlyTabsHolder div?
